synonyms: ātmā—the word ātmā; deha—the body; manaḥ—the mind; brahma—the Absolute Truth; sva-bhāva—nature; dhṛti—firmness; buddhiṣu—in the sense of intelligence; prayatne—in endeavor; ca—and; iti—thus.
translation: " 'The following are synonyms of the word ātmā: the body, mind, Absolute Truth, natural characteristics, firmness, intelligence and endeavor.'

purport.content: This is a quotation from the Viśva-prakāśa dictionary.
